mapper.sql: wo.operate_id, wo.exhibit_id, wo.word_id, wo.type, wo.count, wo.update_date, wo.operate_user
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_word_operate (exhibit_id, word_id, type, count, update_date, operate_user) VALUES
(#{item.exhibitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.wordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
